Knee-length, straight-cut dress in satin with beaded embroidery and sparkly stones, a low stand-up collar, V-neck opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck and long sleeves.
Belt in sturdy canvas with a text print and metal buckle. Width 3.5 cm.
Cotton corduroy jacket with wide stripes and a collar. Buttons down the front, flap chest pockets and buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Calf-length dress in soft jersey with long sleeves, gathers at the front and sides, and a seam at the waist. Unlined.
Sports trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist and wide legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides with press-studs that can be opened all the way down.
Socks in airy jersey with decorative roses and elasticated tops.
Short-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a print motif and plastic beading at the front.
Fitted, calf-length dress in ribbed jersey with long, gathered sleeves and a short slit at the front.
Blouse in a striped weave with an opening and tie at the back of the neck and long sleeves with flared cuffs and a concealed press-stud. Asymmetric hem with a flounce and cut-out opening at the side.
Fitted, long-sleeved top in jersey with a sheen. Draping front and back and gathered sleeves.
Long-sleeved, turtleneck top in lustrous jersey with a heavy drape, pleats on one shoulder and on the sleeves adding to the draped effect, and concealed elastic at the sides of the hem.
Trousers in sturdy crêpe jersey with elastication at the back of the waist, pleats at the front, side pockets and tapered legs with side stripes and elasticated hems.
Fully lined bikini with a triangle top and briefs. Top with sequin-embroidered appliqués, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a plastic fastener at the back.
Hi-top trainers in leather and suede with a soft shaft with narrow elastication at the top, lacing, and a loop at the front and back. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky, fluted rubber soles.
Hi-top trainers in leather and suede with a soft shaft with narrow elastication at the top, lacing, and a loop at the front and back. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky, fluted rubber soles.
Airy top in soft modal jersey with a low-cut back and long sleeves.
Airy top in soft modal jersey with a low-cut back and long sleeves.
Loafers with cut-out sections at the sides, satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 3 cm.
Loafers with cut-out sections at the sides, satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 3 cm.
Flat shoes with elastic gores in the sides. Imitation suede linings, fabric insoles and rubber soles.
Knee-length dress in a heavily draping rib knit containing glittery threads with long raglan sleeves.

Blouse in a soft weave with broderie anglaise and hole-embroidered sections at the front and down the sleeves. Opening at the top and a wide, elasticated neckline with a decorative drawstring. Long, wide raglan sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Longer at the back with a rounded hem.

Blouse in a soft weave with broderie anglaise and hole-embroidered sections at the front and down the sleeves. Opening at the top and a wide, elasticated neckline with a decorative drawstring. Long, wide raglan sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Longer at the back with a rounded hem.
Short velour top with a V-neck with a knot detail at the top and narrow adjustable shoulder straps.
Blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck, button placket, flap chest pockets, long sleeves with a tab and button and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck, button placket, flap chest pockets, long sleeves with a tab and button and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck, button placket, flap chest pockets, long sleeves with a tab and button and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck, button placket, flap chest pockets, long sleeves with a tab and button and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Short-sleeved dress in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey with a collar and concealed press-studs on the shoulders. Sewn-in bodysuit with press-studs at the crotch.
Imitation leather slip-on loafers with small decorative studs and a tab at the front. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2 cm.
Platform sandals with an adjustable ankle strap with concealed elastication and a metal buckle. Fabric insoles and rubber soles. Platform front 2.5 cm, heel 10 cm.
Platform sandals with an adjustable ankle strap with concealed elastication and a metal buckle. Fabric insoles and rubber soles. Platform front 2.5 cm, heel 10 cm.
Aviator-style sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Sweatpants in a relaxed fit with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Slightly lower crotch, and straight legs that taper to the hem.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Lace balconette bra with underwired, mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide good support. Decorative elastic straps at the hem that fasten around the bodice, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Body in lace and mesh with a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and an adjustable horizontal strap at the back. Seam under the bust, a lined crotch with press-studs and cutaway coverage at the back.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with horizontal straps and hooks.
Low strappy sandals in leather with an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle, insoles and soles in rubber.
Low strappy sandals in leather with an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle, insoles and soles in rubber.
Low strappy sandals in leather with an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle, insoles and soles in rubber.
Lace bikini briefs with a mid waist with narrow straps, a lined gusset, narrow sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Lace bikini briefs with a mid waist with narrow straps, a lined gusset, narrow sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Lace bikini briefs with a mid waist with narrow straps, a lined gusset, narrow sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Faux fur mules with insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Faux fur mules with insoles and fluted rubber soles.
